headline: Russia Freed Evan Gershkovich in a Major Prisoner Swap
description: A significant prisoner swap involving seven countries freed Wall Street Journal reporter Evan Gershkovich, two other Americans, and several Russian opposition figures in exchange for the release of eight people, including Vadim Krasikov.
newsletter_headline: Russia Freed Evan Gershkovich in a Major Prisoner Swap
newsletter_sub_hed: Also, a Hamas leader was killed by a bomb planted months ago. Here’s the latest at the end of Thursday.

headline: Hamas leader was killed by a bomb planted months ago
description: A Times investigation found that Ismail Haniyeh, a top leader of Hamas, was assassinated by an explosive device smuggled into his Tehran guesthouse and remotely triggered.
newsletter_headline: Russia Freed Evan Gershkovich in a Major Prisoner Swap

headline: Democrats began voting to make Harris their nominee
description: Democrats began voting to formally select Vice President Kamala Harris as their party’s nominee, following President Biden's withdrawal from the race and his endorsement of Harris.

headline: Secret Service tech flaws helped the Trump shooter slip by
description: A local police officer spotted Thomas Crook on a nearby rooftop before he shot at Trump, but the warning radio message never reached the Secret Service due to tech flaws.
